depositERC20(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params._amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params._gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.
params._to: The address of recipient's account on L2.
params._token: The address of token in L1.

depositERC20(address,uint256,uint256).details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params._amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params._gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.
params._token: The address of token in L1.

depositERC20AndCall(address,address,uint.details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params._amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params._data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params._gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.
params._to: The address of recipient's account on L2.
params._token: The address of token in L1.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to be deposited.
params.gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.
params.to: The address of recipient's account on L2.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to be deposited.
params.gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to be deposited.
params.data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params.gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.
params.to: The address of recipient's account on L2.

finalizeWithdrawERC20(address,address,ad.details: Make this function payable to handle WETH deposit/withdraw.      The function should only be called by L1ScrollMessenger.      The function should also only be called by L2ERC20Gateway in L2.

params._amount: The amount of the token to withdraw.
params._data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params._from: The address of account who withdraw the token in L2.
params._l1Token: The address of corresponding L1 token.
params._l2Token: The address of corresponding L2 token.
params._to: The address of recipient in L1 to receive the token.

finalizeWithdrawETH(address,address,uint.details: This function should only be called by L1ScrollMessenger.      This function should also only be called by L1ETHGateway in L2.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to withdraw.
params.data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params.from: The address of account who withdraw ETH in L2.
params.to: The address of recipient in L1 to receive ETH.

params._token: The address of token to query.

params._defaultERC20Gateway: The address of default ERC20 Gateway contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestERC20(address,address,uint256).details: All the gateways should have reentrancy guard to prevent potential attack though this function.

params.amount: The amount of token to request.
params.sender: The address of sender to request fund.
params.token: The address of token to request.

setDefaultERC20Gateway(address).details: This function should only be called by contract owner.

setERC20Gateway(address[],address[]).details: This function should only be called by contract owner.

params._gateways: The list of addresses of gateways to update.
params._tokens: The list of addresses of tokens to update.

setETHGateway(address).details: This function should only be called by contract owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

ERC20Gateway(address).notice: Mapping from ERC20 token address to corresponding L1ERC20Gateway.

defaultERC20Gateway().notice: The addess of default ERC20 gateway, normally the L1StandardERC20Gateway contract.

depositERC20(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Deposit some token to a recipient's account on L2.

depositERC20(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit some token to a caller's account on L2.

depositERC20AndCall(address,address,uint.notice: Deposit some token to a recipient's account on L2 and call.

depositETH(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit ETH to some recipient's account in L2.

depositETH(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit ETH to caller's account in L2.

depositETHAndCall(address,uint256,bytes,.notice: Deposit ETH to some recipient's account in L2 and call the target contract.

finalizeWithdrawERC20(address,address,ad.notice: Complete ERC20 withdraw from L2 to L1 and send fund to recipient's account in L1.

finalizeWithdrawETH(address,address,uint.notice: Complete ETH withdraw from L2 to L1 and send fund to recipient's account in L1.

gatewayInContext().notice: The address of gateway in current execution context.

getERC20Gateway(address).notice: Return the corresponding gateway address for given token address.

getL2ERC20Address(address).notice: Return the corresponding l2 token address given l1 token address.

requestERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Request ERC20 token transfer from users to gateways.

setDefaultERC20Gateway(address).notice: Update the address of default ERC20 gateway contract.

setERC20Gateway(address[],address[]).notice: Update the mapping from token address to gateway address.

setETHGateway(address).notice: Update the address of ETH gateway contract.

documentation.text: @notice The addess of default ERC20 gateway, normally the L1StandardERC20Gateway contract.
@notice Mapping from ERC20 token address to corresponding L1ERC20Gateway.
@notice The address of gateway in current execution context.

@inheritdoc IL1GatewayRouter
 @dev All the gateways should have reentrancy guard to prevent potential attack though this function.
